outputs.output_descr: The aim is to contribute to the environmental and sustainable development policy of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by consolidating the Natural Resources Training Centre (NRCTC) as a leading training centre for the enhancement of the national and regional capacity for biodiversity conservation and the management of protected areas. This will be achieved through (i) the upgrading and development of training programs finely targeted to the needs of NCWCD, partner organisations and civil society; (ii) capitalising on the results of the first generation of NRCTC courses by formalising key training programs, and initiating a learning process that will progressively build the institutional memory of the training centre; (iii) enhancing the capacity of the NRCTC by establishing a stable institutional framework and a sustainable funding mechanism that will ensure the long-term operation of the Centre.

project_descr: STRENGTHENING OF THE NATURAL RESOURCES CONSERVATION TRAINING CENTER
